website_summaries.verdict: A fun, if small, pendant ceiling light that accents spaces like kitchen islands easily.
pros: Users liked the decorative touch, as well as the clear canopy – which allows natural light through
cons: Some reports of defects or breakage occurring in shipping
Glass canopy is thin, and some report it can crack easily
Canopy and lights often don’t line up well

customer_reviews.title: After searching online for the perfect lights, I stumbled across these
customer_reviews.text: These pendant lights look fabulous over our granite counter tops. After searching online for the perfect lights, I stumbled across these. I have to admit I almost thought the price was too good to be true and would not be a quality light. They do not look cheap, but quite modern and sheik. The cords are covered with a thick plastic making them look like a thick wire. Also, we purchased the designer bulbs that give a vintage appearance to the glass globe making them complete. I love these lights!!
customer_reviews.author: David M Fontz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights.
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. They brighten up my kitchen and look fantastic. The seeded glass does have some variations between the different fixtures, but not enough to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time and without any issues as far as packaging goes. For the price, these are outstanding! We remodeled our kitchen and used two of them over our island. We get compliments all the time! We opted to use Edison bulbs since the lamps shades are see-through- it's much more aesthetically pleasing this way.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Only negative was that I had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pendants. I was about to spend over triple the price on something similar from a big name store then found these gems and they worked out just as well for a lot less $$$. Very happy. Only negative was that I had to return 2 and reorder as 1 had a slightly lopsided glass shade & the other had excessive bubbles in the hand blown glass and a missing piece in the accessory pack. Otherwise perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aussiemum

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 9 left...
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered a total of 9. Returned 3 because they were broken or not working. So then last week, two of the 6 remaining went out. At first I thought the problem was a burnt out bulb, but the unit was still dead after I changed out the bulb. And this week the second one went out. So of the 9 I ordered, 3 went back, and now two more died all within 2 months. They look nice, but I don't have a lot of confidence in their quality. Wondering if I can return hear two bum ones.
customer_reviews.author: W M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good at a lower price than big box stores
customer_reviews.text: We have had this hanging for about two weeks now and have had several compliments. It is above our sink and we wanted something that was not very formal and that matched our silver track lighting since our kitchen cabinets are older. Right after we installed it, we saw the same light (different brand) at Home Depot for $69.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer A Valeri

customer_reviews.title: The quality of these is absolutely TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is absolutely TERRIBLE! The are rough around the finished edge and the have all sorts of water marks from the manufacturing process that do not come clean. We had 2 where the glass was so warped it was driving us crazy! We have sent back and reordered several sets trying to make it work, but now they are all going back. Westinghouse should be ashamed letting this type of quality come off their production lines!

customer_reviews.title: different than you think
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is nicely made, good quality. It is just different than photos are telling you. I thought it will have a slight texture breaking the light, making it more interesting - like on the photo. And large bubbles inside working a bit like prisms. Well, it is shiny, fully transparent clear glass, like a bottle. and it has a few tiny bubbles here and there. But you will see every detail of your bulb through it. Kind of OK, but nothing like picture tells you. A misleading image. A pity. I wanted to buy 3 more. My search for a nice lamp is still on. I would give it 2 and 1/2 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture was purchased to install over my kitchen sink in our newly remodeled kitchen. It was installed on a dimmer switch and performs perfectly allowing me to control the level of lighting needed for the task being performed. I am please with the design and quality and am extremely happy with my new light. The description of the item was accurate as listed on the website and the package arrived, in perfect condition, prior to the estimated delivery date. I am very happy with my new light! I feel I received excellent quality for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not consistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these lights. One of the lights is not balanced - it tilts to one side when we put it up and this is because the housing has not been glued in the center. . The other two are fine and look great. I am past the return window as it took my contractor a month to complete the kitchen remodel and now we are stuck with one that is tilted :(
customer_reviews.author: modz

customer_reviews.title: All three lights we ordered look completely different rendering themeless and no option to return
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these tenant lights to put in our kitchen. Upon opening we discovered all three lights look completely different. One has tons of "bubbles" in the glass and the other a medium amount and the third almost none. Of course they aren't going to be EXACT but these aren't even close! They would look dumb all hanging together. I went to return and there is no option to return so now I am stuck with three useless lights?? I went to Lowed and picked lights I could actually view.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Functional. Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have purchased these lights. The first time was for a lighting update over my kitchen island. I liked them so much I bought them again for an update to my dining room lighting (a collection of pendants that I designed myself). The third time is for installation at my business. The seeded glass is beautiful, the cord is fabric covered. I have ordered a total of 9 of these lights and never had a problem with components. One time the glass was broken but that is reasonable odds that one of nine would have some damage in shipping. Easy return and refund on that. Everything about this light meets my highest expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light, and better yet, the instructions are easy to follow and parts easily identifiable. This is apparently no small feat based on several electronics and furniture items I've put together lately. The light itself will update any outdated space (we're using it as an over-the-sink light) and I believe it would go with almost any decor, unlike an overly modern or contemporary light. Some might read this as the light being "boring", but I think it's perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good contemporary update over our new kitchen peninsula
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are deceiving...this does not have a metal hanging tube. This lamp hangs from the clear PVC insulation covering the wiring. The length is adjusted by loosening a plastic setscrew on the top plate collar and pulling the cord through to your needed length. This definitely brightened up a section of our kitch that has been dark for years with the ancient, shaded chandelier that hung over the table. Comes with all hardware needed to mount to an existing ceiling box. For the price, we're content with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: Broke it before installing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value but the glass is so thin on the pendant itself I cracked it placing (not dropping) it on the granite counter top. It reminds me of crystal glass ware, you have to be very careful, more than I was. Also I was converting a recessed light into a pendant and the kit that they sell didn't line up without bending the brackets to line up. I learned this after pondering it for some time. Not the best quality but I guess you get what you pay for. Not sure if I'll replace this or get another that is 2x to 3x as much for more durability.
customer_reviews.author: Hesed2020

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: These pendant lights look AWESOME over our granite counter tops. After searching online for the perfect lights, I stumbled across these. I originally found them on Wayfair for a lot more, so I almost thought the price was too good to be true or that maybe it would not be a good quality light. They do not look cheap, but quite nice, modern and maybe a little sheik. The cords are covered with a thick plastic making them look like a thick wire. Also, I purchased the designer bulbs that give a vintage appearance to the glass globe making them complete. I love these lights!!
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: We like this so much we bought SIX more
customer_reviews.text: This hanging light is what Edison bulbs were invented for. It showcases their beauty while being unique in what seems to be a hand-blown glass shade. We have put them everywhere and they lend a splendid continuity to a large house with many different styles added over the years. All arrived in impeccable condition, safely packaged. You can also adjust the cord length to short, medium or long depending on the room size. Highly recommended; guests have already commented on what an improvement these are!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: For me, it was a nightmare to install, typical Chinese directions which just toss into the recycle trash . All wires are the same color and have a small tab noting L,N and Grnd , if you cut the wire good luck I have no clue how you figure out which one is which . I wrapped the long wire around the inside ceiling cup rather than cut it. This Westinghouse company typically subjects their customers with this type of scenario but the light is nice for the price, good luck!
customer_reviews.author: inxs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen needed these lights. After reading the other reviews I was worried about the bubbles in the lights not matching but there is not enough of a difference to be noticeable. The “oil rubbed bronze” is really just black but still worked well with my kitchen- which has actual oil rubbed bronze features. They really should just call it black, though, and is the only reason I am not giving it a full 5 stars. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but two pendants were not the same
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these pendants. They are a great price for the value. My only complaint is each piece of glass covering is not the same. My first order had one pendant with a lot of the "bubbling" decor in the glass. The other one barely had any and it had a seam in the glass. It was very easy to return/exchange for another one. The second order matched a lot better and they look beautiful in my kitchen. They look upscale for a discounted price. Happy with my purchase overall but wished I could have installed both at the same time without having to do an exchange. Install was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: All crooked
customer_reviews.text: so we bought 3 of these to hang over our island. Only 1 glass pendant is straight. The other 3 are crooked, and this isn't something that can be fixed. The metal insert with the bulb socket was installed crooked in 2 pendants. And what's more upsetting is you can't really tell they are crooked until you hang them. So now we have 3 jankety looking pendants above our island. SUPER POOR QUALITY. To anyone that bought these and they were straight, you must've gotten super lucky.
customer_reviews.author: SaraK

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful! Tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! Tons of compliments. Excellent product for the price!! Bought for guest bath and love them. So inexpensive compared to same product at other stores!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good match
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two lights for our bar area. The seeding on the glass does not match even close. One is cracked in shipping and it’s a hassle for me to return for replacement. Disappointed because I love the style.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Good value even with glass issue
customer_reviews.text: Looks great over kitchen sink. Tiny bubbles in glass not evenly distributed and sparse on half of globe. I was able to adjust the globe to but best area forward. Install not too fiddly but not a fan of those little balls. Does not come wirh screws to mount bracket into box. I would buy again as it is so much cheaper than in store but wish glass was more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw. Glass shade does not come off fixture.
customer_reviews.text: While they are beautiful the design has a major flaw! The glass does not come apart from the fixture. While installing this light it slipped through my husbands hands, fell and broke. Can not replace just the glass. So bought another one and this time I was installing it and the same thing happened! Unreal!! Very poor design to have a glass shade dangling while your trying to connect and adjust wiring. Contacted the manufacturer with no response.
customer_reviews.author: A. Metter

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The light looks much more expensive than it really is. That being said, it's evident corners were cut in terms of the wiring. While I'm not concerned of an inherent fire hazard or electrical short, I've never worked with wiring as thin as what is found on this light. Make sure to have electrical tape on hand as an additional measure to ensure the wire caps do not come loose. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bollom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a great value. My open box item arrived with a small crack though.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as an open box item, in new condition. It was not listed with a crack, but had about a 1.5” crack in the glass. The directions advised a certified electrician is needed to shorten the cord. I am lucky and have an electrician neighbor. I watched him shorten the cord, I probably could have done it without his help. Unfortunately the globe did hit the stove in the process and caused 2 more cracks. We hung it so the cracks face the back (it is above my sink), they are still visible, but I think a person would have to look for them. I would definitely order these again, but not open box.
customer_reviews.author: H. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Don't be afraid of Amazon like new!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from Amazon as like new. They were in the original boxes and didn't look like they were ever opened at all. All the parts were there. They are very nice looking pendent lights for very little money. I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty lights!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the too-modern lights over our breakfast bar with these. Put some Edison bulbs in, although the color is yellow, this has nothing to do with the lamp covers. The bubbling is very consistent in the glass (yes they are glass, I dropped one during installation), and there's more than enough cord for any reasonable installation (we have 12' ceilings above the bar). Quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I put these in the kitchen and really liked the look. I installed three of them in the kitchen. The lights are assembled with the pedestal in four pieces that you screw together to adjust the length. I had to shorten the height (length) and you need to pay attention when disassembling as there are small plastic inserts on the end of each tube. The "heat/abrasion tube at the top can be difficult to re-install I found that by partially installing the protector and cutting the exposed wires off it was easier to put everything back together. Saved the extra tubes and will try a DIY wind chime.
customer_reviews.author: Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is simply beautiful! I have it hanging in my stair well. Just had to shorten the cord a bit. Note: mine had a plastic tightening screw on the base. This is a flathead screw. It’s a bit challenging to figure that out. Otherwise, very straightforward install. Directions are easy to follow. I love the elegance it gives to my home.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: Great look at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Great look at a low price. I installed the light at the shortest length (cut the wire and pushed up to metal on metal) so it does not appear as a hanging light. Looks great as a hanging light or not. Good quality and a nice heavy glass with bulb inclusions, a more retro or antique look.
customer_reviews.author: DP Og

customer_reviews.title: AC to DC
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this light fixture and converted it to a DC battery operated fixture. Accomplished this by ordering a Halitchi 2 set 8 x AA battery, but only used one for my project. Also ordered 2 pac low-voltage bulbs 12v LED, e26 LED bulbs, etc. I can't say, I understand all of the bulb information but I followed the instructions I found on the internet for converting AC fixture to battery operated DC fixture. Even though, I say so myself, it turned out beyond my expectations. The light fixture is perfect and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Janke

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights and I get tons of compliments on them. I did have to ordered more than I needed to get the right amount of bubbles in the glass that I wanted. I ordered from 2 different places but had the same problem with both. The downside is that the glass is not replaceable and the whole fixture must be replaced if broken. The glass is also very fragile if bumped.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Nice subtle customization to any kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: These are almost exactly what I pictured when designing my kitchen. Easy to install and adjust wire length. I would recommend some cool bulbs! I say almost exactly because I thought that the bubbles in the glass would be bigger. I still love them! We ordered two and one of the two packages was missing the bracket to hold in the ceiling. It was replaced with a new fixture at no cost by shipper. We are very happy with the overall look and ease of order and install!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY CEILING LIGHTS
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as replacements for four ceiling lights in my kitchen that were so ugly they just got tossed. I am very satisfied with these except you can't take off the covers for easy cleaning. They do wipe up pretty well though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Conlan

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice. They go very well with out white cabinets ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these to go over a kitchen island. They are very nice. They go very well with out white cabinets and White Ice granite. They match the nickel finish of our hardware pretty well. The only issue is keeping them clean. Pretty hard to keep them super clean and free of dust or issues. But a small price to pay for how nice they are.
customer_reviews.author: Giantsfan510

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light! Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update an old fluorescent bar light and didn't want to spend a ton. This light was perfect for above the sink. It allows you to adjust the length to very short or very long. The glass shade is beautiful! My hub had it up in no time and it really is bright. I had to buy a much lower wattage bulb because it shines so well. You will not be sorry on this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Suk Hall

customer_reviews.title: Some issues with the glass.
customer_reviews.text: These fixtures are well worth the price paid but the seeding (air bubbles) varies way to much. Of the 3 ordered, one has a really nice amount of seeding, one has much less and the third one nearly no seeding, it's practically clear glass. I probably should return them but I think they will look OK at the distance they will usually be viewed. The packaging was a little iffy but made it here OK and arrived ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Willie X

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOOK
customer_reviews.text: SUCH A COOL LIGHT. I REALLY LOVE ALL THE LIGHT I GET IN THE KITCHEN NOW. AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WOULD NOT WORK IN MY FLORIDA HOME BECAUSE OF THE VAULTED CEILINGS. BUT BECAUSE OF THE FLEXIBLE CORD IT WORKED GREAT. I FOUND A COORDIANITING LIGHT TO GO OVER OUR OTHER COUNTERS. SUPER COOL LOOK TO AN UPDATED FORIDA HOME. . NOT GOOD AT POSTING PICTURES OR I WOULD HAVE SENT YOU ONE. VERY EASY TO INSTALL.
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these pendants!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love these pendant lights!!!!! We recently remodeled our entire kitchen. I wanted pendant lights that would put off a decent amount of light and look great as well. I must say, for the price, they are exactly what I was looking for. I absolutely love the seeded glass!!! Gives it a different look. It was very easy to adjust the cord to the height we needed as well. I am so happy I decided on these pendants. They look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R Watkins

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: We were redoing our kitchen and wanted to add hanging lights above our peninsula instead of the existing can lights. Since we do not have a huge kitchen I did not want large lights that would look disproportionate. These were perfect. The price was great compared to others. I liked the fact that they had seeded glass since we were installing some glass cabinets that also had the seaded glass. It ended up tying in together perfectly and they look more expensive than they actually were
customer_reviews.author: C. Welbon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT value!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after I read all the reviews, but decided to take the risk due to the great value. SO GLAD I did!!! The glass was NOT fragile or thin... it was like your average margarita glass. The bubbles in the glass are well distributed and leave charming shadows on the ceiling. Plate was easy to install and we had no issues. Cord is long, but it was so easy to just wrap it in a circle inside the plate when we adjusted the cord to suit our kitchen. I love this light!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Teresa Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great look for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These look and work just great. We used CMYK Vintage Edison LED Bulb, Dimmable 4W ST64... Cmyk® bulbs with them. The label tabs for the hot, neutral and ground tend to fall off when you are shortening the wire during installation. However, if you look closely you will be able to see the indicators printed lightly on the 3 different wires. One was broken but no problem getting it replaced by Amazon. We have been using for 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Break Very Very easily!
customer_reviews.text: I did write the 5-star review now that is lowered to three. Not because my original impression but because they are extremely FRAGEL I am not ordering another light this will be the second replacement since originally putting these in. Admittedly they were broke one by me one by my wife but it took very little to shatter them
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I don't tend to worry about something being in style; I am more influenced by my reaction to an item. I love this new light for over the kitchen sink. I think it is beautiful. Because it is clear, this product allows natural light to come in the window in addition to letting me see all the trees outside. The 60 watt clear bulb I put in it, adds plenty of light at night.
customer_reviews.author: KOhio

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured product
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered 4 of these lights then ordered an additional light when the kitchen remodel took a different turn. These lights looked fine upon opening the box. I only opened one.....big mistake. Of the 5 I ordered ...3 of them have defects that weren't noticable until the electrician began hanging them. The socket inside the glass is crooked. There is no way to adjust the cords for these lights so there is no way to make them look even. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this pendant!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this great Westinghouse light to cover an unexpected hole in the tin ceiling of a bay window. (tip - pay attention to old tin when painting because you might push right through). We didn't need anything huge or fancy, just something to cover the hole as if we intended to have a light there. This surpassed our expectations. We have received compliment after compliment on it. Love the glass! Love the look of it. I've had friends pay much higher prices for similar pendants that are totally surprised when I say this was under $30.!!! Looks great with the Edison type bulb.
customer_reviews.author: teambyrne

customer_reviews.title: The metal is more of a champagne color but fits in just fine in my mixed metal home.
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box on this light I immediately was disappointed because it wasn’t the Golden color I thought it would be. However once this light was installed I could not have been more pleased. I have it over my kitchen sink and it is just simply beautiful! The seeded glass makes the most incredible shadows on the wall. Just stunning. So glad we kept this light and didn’t return it upon first sight. Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking pendant light
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and style of this light over my kitchen sink. The bubbles in the glass give it a nice look, but don't give any altered light effects in the rest of the room. Cord was easily shortened to length I needed. Be aware this does hang from the ceiling by only the cord, there is no rod to go between the ceiling base and the fixture itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Took them out of the box and both had scratches all over them. They also have a haze all over the glass and no matter how I try to clean them, it never goes away. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Right Style
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the money. It is as described. The seeded glass is the vintage, industrial look I was going for. We had the electrician install when he was adding a few new ceiling lights around the house. I can’t speak to whether it was hard to install, but he did it quickly so it must not have been difficult. I need to get a vintage, Edison-type bulb to really make the fixture “pop.” Adds great light to a dark stairwell. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ncmomma123

customer_reviews.title: Good price but quality inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: 1 was cracked on arrival. Returned with ease but then one was clear and the other appeared cloudy/dusty. Id say just be prepared to exchange. We finally got a set that was decently consistent and they look nice but the inconsistency was annoying. Maybe just back luck on our part
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great price and it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a whim because I honestly couldn't believe it was so inexpensive and looked so good in the photo. I wasn't sure what I was going to receive but I was pleasantly surprised when I opened it up and found a gorgeous light. It looks so pretty when lit and when it's not and is a perfect edition to our kitchen. We weren't crazy about the way it hangs with just the wire so we actually had an extra piece from our chandelier that we put over the wire to make it look finished. Other than that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mg109

customer_reviews.title: The price was great too.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four of these lights. Three hang over my island and the fourth is over the kitchen sink. They are all on dimmers with Edison style bulbs in the amber color. I removed a couple walls and went for an open concept floorplan (kitchen, living room, and dining room). I wanted pendant lights that would blend in rather than be the focal point of the room. These lights do exactly as I wanted. They don't distract from everything else in the room but they do enhance it. The price was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Buffa

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These aren't amazing or fabulous but they are attractive and really affordable. I bought them for my remodeled kitchen because I needed something fairly quickly and couldn't find "the one". I didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on pendant lights unless I was in love with them. These look good enough over my peninsula that I can live with them a long time until I find the perfect fixture (could be years). As other reviewers have stated, they do seem a little fragile but if you're careful when installing that's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in a hallway, looks beautiful, very bright, easy to put up, and was delivered quickly. P.S. I ordered a second one to install in the laundry room, it came fast, but was the wrong color. I ordered brushed nickel, the item delivered was black. I am a bit disappointed about the color, but I decided to still use this fixture. It works the way expected.
customer_reviews.author: YLY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but weak glass.....
customer_reviews.text: While this Pendant light is very beautiful, my contractor was putting it up and the glass broke. It snapped off as if it had a crack in it. I assumed because of the bubble looking that it possibly made it weak. I was just coming on to print a return and it only had a 30 day return window as of two days ago. So, I'm not against the light fixture but it does leave a sour taste because of the quick return window. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The frosted glass look is nice, and each light is slightly larger than your ...
customer_reviews.text: The frosted glass look is nice, and each light is slightly larger than your average pendant. We combined 2 pendants into one fixture and used for the kitchen. If we didn't have to ship these across border the price and value would have been quite good. One word of warning: Use caution if installing yourself and have little knowledge. Our wires were not labeled and appeared to all be the same colour at first glance. Only a very subtle, easy to overlook stripe was placed on each wire. You don't want to assume all wires are the same, or mix them up!
customer_reviews.author: sewinn

customer_reviews.title: Unique light, looks great with vintage bulb
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I hung this light in a small hallway heading downstairs to our living room. While I think it's typically used as a pendant light in the kitchen, we mounted it flush to the ceiling and put in a vintage style bulb. The seeded glass is really beautiful, and overall we are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KeetLover

customer_reviews.title: The cord looks like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Pros: seeded glass, size, shape, price Con: looks cheap with the plastic covering the wires (maybe I should have picked the bronze color instead of the nickel for this reason) the cord still hangs crooked after a year later
customer_reviews.author: elaine0009

customer_reviews.title: Beware - very, very fragile
customer_reviews.text: These are very, very fragile. I bought five but have to replace one (that I've already hung) because it's cracked across the side. When I examined the shade, one of the "bubbles" in the glass was at the edge, creating a major weakness in the structure. These are Westinghouse but Chinese-made. They have a great, 5 year warranty, but it's not worth it when you have to replace one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Bought them for a remodel, so the contractor didn’t hang them until 2 days after the return date. The hanging cord is made of wire covered in hard plastic. The plastic doesn’t hang straight. I would return if I could
customer_reviews.author: Teaspoon50

customer_reviews.title: Biggest “mini” pendant I ever saw
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this “Mini” pendant light. It’s really a huge pendant light. Seriously you can stick your face in it it’s so big. It’s absolutely beautiful and good quality but I needed a mini pendant and this is just to big.
customer_reviews.author: PA Lineman

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and well-priced but was hard to install because of missing bolts
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little pendant light. Gorgeous bubble glass. I bought it used so my only complaint is that it was missing the bolts for the canopy and therefore it was VERY difficult to install. Had it had those bolts, install would have been a snap.
customer_reviews.author: SaraK.

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this light. I purchased three to install between the kitchen and dining room and they look beautiful. My husband says they were pretty easy to install. I like that they have extra cord length so if you want them to hang longer or shorter, it's all adjustable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg... There are more beautiful in person than the pictures. I just build a new home and these where great for my kitchen light fixtures. I’am completely In love with them and so happy with my Purchase. It was fast shipping and worth the money. I will recommend these to anyone 100%.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer j.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious about the quality given the low price but ordered two and am very pleased. The beaded glass with Edison bulbs create a very authentic and upscale look. Easily installed in can light fixtures with the westinghouse can light conversion kit also on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: vlmillard

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Simple and elegant - the seeded glass is lovely. Paired with an Edison bulb they put off a nice warm glow. Good quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Heathm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to hang over my bathroom vanity. I have one hanging on each side of the mirror. The metal is black which is what I wanted. Love the bubbles in the glass. We used led edison bulbs and it looks so stylish in our farmhouse bathroom! These were on sale for $16 when we bought them. You can't beat that! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick/I’d buy something else
customer_reviews.text: These would do the trick if you own a rental or selling a house but they are not as nice as they look in the photo. I still have them up, but they are on the things to replace even though I put them up last month. However, for what I paid, I shouldn’t be complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Palm T.

customer_reviews.title: Look great, great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at very similar lights as a nearby lighting showroom. So glad I checked on Amazon before I purchased there. Everyone loves them and you can't tell I saved hundreds.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Blown glass pendent perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these lights. Returned another set of clear glass cylinder ones because of the fingerprint hazard. The bubbles are beautiful, classic and mask dust and prints. Paired with the edison bulbs they look gorgeous. Should have done this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Casey H.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Hassle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three fixtures for my kitchen island. Two out of three showed up damaged. I requested replacements and received one of them today....also damaged. Sending them all back for a refund. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Neptune

customer_reviews.title: Beware! More hardware will be needed!
customer_reviews.text: This disappoints me greatly to write this. I have purchased these lights before. The last ones were great. Hardware was correct. This set I purchased came with 1.5” screws which 2” are needed. Unless your ceilings are 1/4” thick. The screws are not standard or metric. They must be some new standard of measure. I am writing this as leave to make my 3rd trip to Home Depot. I know just need to completely buy new screws and nut caps to mount to a standard drop ceiling. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light however I did not know that it didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice light however I did not know that it didn't come with a rod to support\cover the wire. If you don't mind the lamp hanging from the ceiling and a dangling cord then go for it. I had to use a rod I had from my old Tiffany to adjust it from swinging. Also cord was way too long, I had to cut a lot to adjust to fit exactly where I wanted it. So that's why I give it three stars only!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, globes smaller than I needed for space and could have used bigger ones over my island. Would love different size options Would like matching or complimenting dining room or over sing options. Would like option of a metal rod as kinks from cord still present after several weeks- hoping in time it will be less noticeable. Packaged well. Believe arrived on time but sat here for long period due to construction delays. Would order again
customer_reviews.author: K. Czajka

customer_reviews.title: Looks high end!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They look like they are worth much more than I paid for them. Single girl and I managed to install them myself. Definitely a good idea to watch several videos about the electrical wiring. One of the cords is not wanted to straighten and I was missing some wire caps, that’s why I took off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Julea R. Brode

customer_reviews.title: the Air bubbles trapped in the Glass just look great! Easy to read wiring
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the Money with these lights... the Air bubbles trapped in the Glass just look great! Easy to read wiring, easy to mount on a different base, lots of extra insulated Wire so if you buy multiple lights you have plenty to "stagger the heights" ... with the Antique bulbs they look like a 200$ light fixture... really good value! No doubt will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rentia O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Not happy i cannot use one so the both have to come down
customer_reviews.text: My home is being renovated. The electrician unboxed the lights to hang and one of the light globes is broken. As i am looking the return window ended on the 8th. I need a refund. Or a replacement sent asap. Please contact me
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and with the Edison bulbs gives a great light to the remodeled kitchen and breakfast bar area. Only drawback (minor one) is that they do catch the dust which is very prevalent here in AZ. But I love them and would recommend them to anyone looking or a sleek yet classic look.
customer_reviews.author: GMCUSMC

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - Low Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: We recently installed THREE this after a remodel we did in our house. I was cleaning/wiping the dust and it cracked and a piece just came and flung out. Out of the three pendant lights two of them are shaped weird. I should have opened it up and inspected right when I received them and not waited until we were done with the remodel. So I guess I can't send this back or exchange them now ????
customer_reviews.author: JayZL

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great if it made it in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light fixture and would have been happy with the product if an amazon delivery drive didn’t hand me a box that very obviously had shattered glass in it. As soon as I moved the box and heard the noise I opened the door to give it back to her but she was gone. The light is pictured on the box it was delivered in so very clearly contained glass but was not treated as such.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I replaced that outdated "can light" above my kitchen sink. WOW! I did need to purchase a medallion to help cover the hole from the can light. It looks marvelous. This makes me so happy. So very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cave

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted, simple elegance!
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed 6 of these lights in our kitchen, at two differing heights on our 12 foot. ceilings. We love the simple elegance they add to our kitchen and would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of bang for the buck with these lights. I bought some LED Edison bulbs and they look so classy over my island. I have an open concept house and everyone states how much they really like the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Farmhouse Island Lights
customer_reviews.text: I painstakingly looked at thousands of light fixture ideas before I chose this. I wanted something of a modern farmhouse without being too over the top into that theme. After looking at what seemed like a million light made out of mason jars and/or wine bottles, I finally found this. It came down to two choices for me and I am very happy with how it turned out. Now on to finish the floor!
customer_reviews.author: TheBajan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and worth the money. I saw some reviewers say they were delicate and easily breakable, but this isn’t my experience. The glass seems pretty thick and all three that I ordered arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Looks like it cost way more
customer_reviews.text: This is so stylish. I installed two, one directly over a sink area and one over a lottle breakfast area. You can use the Edison bulbs but that gives off an amber light and is not very bright. I used plan bulbs in mine and I love it. It’s bright and I think it looks great. You can adjust the length of how low it hangs from the ceiling. Very easy. But once you make that cut, you can not go shorter so make sure you know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: JeanineK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We thought we would replace these later because they were so absurdly inexpensive ($18 each!), but they look great up! I’m seriously not sure anyone would notice if I spent hundreds more on another light of a similar design. Just be sure to use the clear “Edison” bulbs (not included) and they’ll look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check bulb socket to make sure it is centered.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered with slight defect the bulb socket was installed crooked so I tried to loosen socket to center it and globe broke. I reordered new one. It cost me double so hope next one bulb socket is straight.. I wish manufacturers would credit me for first one.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: doesn't come with necessary parts for install.
customer_reviews.text: The light is finally installed and looks great. However, this product does not come with necessary mounting screws and I still do not have the correct ones, so the metallic plate that covers the wires in the ceiling isn't flush with the ceiling. Can't really notice it but it is a gap of almost an inch. Quite annoying and OCD causing. Also, the wires are cheap and thin so the wire nuts fell of quite easily. before I could even wrap electrical tape on them. Great product when done, however, installation is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Northen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for above my sink but the quality control of the product needs attention. The light sits in the glass a little off centered. Drives my perfectionist eyes a little crazy but not enough to do with the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G

customer_reviews.title: Love my new pendant lights
customer_reviews.text: Love my new pendant lights. However, my husband had a little trouble putting it up initially because the screws that came with the lights were too long. He was able to mount it fine with smaller screws. Love the look especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ThompsonThomas

customer_reviews.title: Quality & style
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fixtures. Good quality & reasonable price. If you’re looking to spruce up your kitchen space, perhaps a bar area- they are a perfect fit for those spaces. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aldridk Gessa

customer_reviews.title: look better in person
customer_reviews.text: installed 3 of these over the kitchen island. They look great. I recommend only 40w bulbs or make sure they are dimmable. Also be careful when installing, because I broke one just by barely dinging the counter edge while lifting it in place. Had to order another to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item "Used - good condition" and I'm glad I did. The pendant was in perfect condition except the box, which is unimportant to me. Saved a lot of money. The copper color was just what I was looking for. Love the metal rod that covers the wire all the way down. A very clean look in my opinion. The height is adjustable too. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Alisse

customer_reviews.title: Cute pendant light.
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I needed a cute pendant light over my sink and didn’t want to pay a ridiculous amount. With the seeded glass, and the shape, this light was perfect for the old farmhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful price. Extremely satissued with how these fixtures turned ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Wonderful price. Extremely satissued with how these fixtures turned out. They are all one piece, so no assembly required. Our electrician installed these with no hiccups. The cord can be shortened by just loosening a screw and pushing the cord up into the base of the light. Pictures just don't do these fixtures justice. I went with a round 60W led Edison bulb so the bulb wouldn't go past the bottom of the glass. So happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: These lights updated our kitchen island, were packaged well and look amazing! I also ordered the LED filament bulbs and they are dimmable. On full power, they are very bright!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 6100800 Adjustable Indoor Mini-Pendant Light, Oil Rubbed Bronze Finish with Handblown Clear Seeded Glass
product_meta.description: Color:Oil-rubbed BronzeEvoking warmth and ambiance, this industrial inspired Westinghouse Mini Pendant adds a timeless accent to any decor. The canopy and socket boast a handsome oil rubbed bronze finish, while clear seeded glass gives this piece its illuminating elegance. The handcrafted nature of hand blown glass enhances the classic vintage appeal. Install this beautiful pendant in foyers, bedrooms, kitchens, office reception areas, restaurants, hotels or shops. The adjustable cord makes it ideal for rooms with high or low ceilings. To create a retro-vintage look, use with a Westinghouse Timeless or Filament LED light bulb. Westinghouse is a trusted, global brand. Westinghouse knows lighting and offers products with exceptional quality, reliability and functionality. Product reference number 61008. Back Plate Height : 0.86 inches, Back Plate Diameter : 5 inches
feature_bullets: One-light mini pendant with hand blown clear seeded glass shade and oil rubbed bronze finish adds retro style
May be installed on sloped ceilings, includes instructions and mounting hardware for easy installation
Height 60-inches, Diameter 7-inches, Cord length 50 inches maximum
Uses one 60-watt medium-base light bulb (not included), for vintage appeal use Westinghouse Timeless or filament LED light bulbs
Five-year limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship; ETL/CETL listed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,944 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
